name: Moln치r recreation, 1.0
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Moln치r. I used code example from Garrit, but made some small changes, for example changed the size and layers of the rectangles.

name: Moln치r recreation, 1.1
description: In this variation I added loop and some rotation in the layers.

name: Moln치r recreation, 1.2
description: In this variation I added some strokeWeight, transparance, changed shapes etc

name: Noise recreation, 2.0
description: This is an artwork made with inspiration from Perlin Noise. I created this with help from Garrits example code and changed for example colors and the counter

name: Noise recreation, 2.1
description: In this variation, I changed the colors, shape, counter, size, and divider, and added noise-based offsets so the grid appears to drift and flow.

name: Hobbs recreation, 3.0
description: This is a recreation of flow fields by Tyler Hobbs, this art piece also includes noise to get nice and smooth angles.

name: Hobbs recreation, 3.1
description: In this variation I have added a grid and slow animation, creating longer, flowing lines

name: Kaleidoscope, 4.0
description: This is an art inspired by the kaleidoscope code available on canvas but changed a few elements, such as just having one drawing line with ellipses. In this art piece, I have also added an oscillator that triggers everytime you click with the mouse.
